reporting-org.narrative: European Commission - DG Neighbourhood and Enlargement Negotiations

title.narrative: Strenghtening the regulatory and institutional framework of Public Internal Financial Control (PIFC) and supporting the Central Harmonisation Unit in its role of operationalising the new systems in the Republic of Armenia

description.narrative: 1. Revision of legislation to match good practice for public internal financial control. The leg-islation covers the Treasury, the Budget, the Civil Service, public organisations and local government.2. Adoption of standards for internal control and internal audit that are in line with international good practice, incl. risk man-agement3. Implementation of the foundation of the pillar on FMC. Further development of the pillars on IA and CHU.

title.narrative: Number of government public finance managers trained on financial control mechanisms designed to guarantee public accountability

description.narrative: Reported results indicators by the European Commission ¿ International Cooperation and Development (DEVCO) may not represent the complete set of indicators monitored for the project. The results are reported using a contribution approach. This means that where a project has been financed by the EU jointly with other funders ¿ such as partner country governments or other donors ¿ the overall outputs of the collective effort are reported rather than outputs attributed to the share of funding provided by the EU. For higher levels of results, such as outcomes and impacts, the project will only have contributed to the overall effort.
